AAO.caption: Recipient
AAO.doc: Mobile number to send SMS with the country code (ex : 33689965433))
AAO.name: recipient

AAP.caption: Sender
AAP.doc: Name of the sender. The number of characters is limited to 11 for alphanumeric characters and 15 for numeric characters
AAP.name: sender

AAQ.caption: Content
AAQ.doc: Content of the message. If more than 160 characters long, will be sent as multiple text messages
AAQ.name: content

AAU.caption: Web Url
AAU.doc: Webhook to call for each event triggered by the message (delivered etc.)
AAU.name: weburl

AAV.caption: Unicode Enabled
AAV.doc: Format of the message. It indicates whether the content should be treated as unicode or not.
AAV.name: unicodeenabled
